name: Sleep Walker (RebornIllu)
description:
This is a short 2D platformer where you run and jump through dreams and nightmares in an attempt to get the sacred alarm clock and get a good nights sleep! Avoid pits and spikes while switching between the two realms and use the different layouts of the dimensions to make it to the end! Made in 48 hours for the MSU Spartasoft Fall Jam 2022!

Controls: 

A or Left Arrow - Move left

D or Right Arrow - Move right

Space - Jump

F - Switch realm

Credits: 

Aleeya - Art, Design

Ethan Powell - Level Design, Design, Programming

Ethan Tobias - Sound, Programming, Design

Jacob Norber - Art, Level Design, Design

Jay Lee - Art, Concept Design

Zoie Tsoi - Concept Design, Programming, Design
